channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游리 03:16 Alarm lifted in Cherkasy region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Zolotonoskiy district
item.description: 游리 03:16 Alarm lifted in Cherkasy region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Zolotonoskiy district#Cherkasy_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 01:04 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Pokrovska territorial community. Take cover!
item.description: 游댮 01:04 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Pokrovska territorial community. Take cover! #Pokrovska_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
